refnamediv.refpurpose: Issues one or more score line events from an instrument at i-time.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: scoreline_i will issue score events at i-time. It can handle strings in the same conditions as the standard score. Multi-line strings are accepted, using {{ }} to enclose the string.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: Sin -- a string (in double-quotes or enclosed by {{ }}) containing one or more score events.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
